verses.roman:
sūtra kari' saba līlā karila granthana
pāche vistāriyā tāhāra kaila vivaraṇa

synonyms: sūtra kari'-making a synopsis; saba—all; līlā—pastimes; karila—did; granthana—writing in the book; pāche—later; vistāriyā—vividly describing; tāhāra—all of them; kaila—did; vivaraṇa—description.
translation: He first summarized all the pastimes of the Lord and later described them vividly in detail.
